business.headline: 90-hour workweek: What India Inc thinks of L&T chief's suggestionL&T Chairman SN Subrahmanyan recently expressed regret over not being able to make employees work on Sundays, suggesting that a 90-hour workweek is key to success.

Will the stock market recover next week? 4 things you should knowGlobal headwinds and FII outflows weigh on the Sensex and Nifty. Will Dalal Street see a recovery next week after the turbulent run?

Explained: Why Infosys has filed counter lawsuit against CognizantInfosys vs Cognizant legal battle: The Bengaluru-based firm accused its US-based rival of contractually restricting clients from awarding IT services to competitors and withholding software training, which Infosys claims hindered its ability to compete.
High-return FD offers in 2025: SBI, IDBI, Indian Bank, and moreEnhance your savings in 2025 with FD schemes offering up to 8.05% interest, valid until March 31, 2025.

Supreme Court gives big relief for online gaming sector. Details hereThe Supreme Court has stayed Rs 1.12 lakh crore GST notices against online gaming firms, with a final hearing scheduled for March 18, 2025.

Industry leaders call for up to 90-hour workweek. Are they willing to pay more? L&T Chairman SN Subrahmanyan made waves by suggesting employees should work on Sundays. Last year, Infosys co-founder Narayana Murthy proposed that millennials work 70-hour weeks to improve India's productivity.
Budget 2025: Don't expect these tax changesBudget 2025 is likely to prioritise fiscal discipline, minor tax tweaks, and cautious consumption boosts over bold reforms.

Rupee hits all-time low, nears 86 mark against US dollarRupee hits all-time: Closing at 85.9650, the rupee marked its tenth consecutive weekly loss, slipping 0.2% this week amid a strong dollar and persistent capital outflows.
Sensex, Nifty close lower amid earnings concerns; TCS gains 6% The S&P BSE Sensex lost 241.30 points to end at 77,378.91, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 95 points to end at 23,431.50.

Explained: Why IRCTC share price jumped up to 5% todayIRCTC share price: The stock rose nearly 5% to hit a day's high of Rs 800.65 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), compared to the previous close of Rs 763.50.
Blinkit launches Bistro app for 10-minute food deliveryBlinkit's Bistro delivers canteen-style food in 10 minutes, rivalling Swiggy's Snacc and Zepto Cafe.

Paytm sees strong institutional growth: Mutual fund stake surges by 3.3%, total holdings up 4%Paytm's progress toward achieving EBITDA before ESOP breakeven by Q4 FY2025 further reinforces its strong fundamentals and appeal to institutional investors.

Budget 2025: Looking back at tax relief measures for senior citizens in 2024Senior citizens seek tax relief and reforms in Budget 2025 to tackle inflation, income challenges and enhance their qulity of life.
GST return filing delayed. Deadline extension expectedGST return filing faces delays due to GSTN portal glitches, with a potential deadline extension expected to ease compliance challenges.

L&T chairman earned 534.57 times median salary of peers in FY24. Check detailsLarsen & Toubro (L&T) Chairman SN Subrahmanyan's remarks on the 90-hour workweek have been a topic of debate. Amid all this, his salary for FY24 has attracted eyeballs, which is 534.57 times the median salary of peers.
How to link and use your credit card for UPI transactions. A simple guideUPI integration with credit cards simplifies payments offering instant, secure, and contactless transactions.

Sensex, Nifty in volatile territory: What should stock market investors do? Stock market today: Sensex and Nifty rebounded on IT gains, but volatility persists amid FII outflows and global uncertainty. Here's what's driving the market and how investors should tackle it.

Budget 2025: What is joint taxation for married couples?The ICAI's Budget 2025 proposal for joint taxation of married couples aims to ease financial stress, boost compliance, and modernise India's tax system with higher exemptions and flexible slabs.

Tata Elxsi share price down 8%. Why did it hit 52-week low after Q3 results?Tata Elxsi stock price: At 10:40 a.m., Tata Elxsi's share price was down 7% at Rs 5992.95. In early trade, the stock hit a 52-week low of Rs 5,924.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: S Jaishankar to attend Donald Trump's oath taking ceremony on January 20The invitation for Jaishankar's attendance was extended by the Trump-Vance Inaugural Committee. This visit is expected to further cement the diplomatic ties between the two nations as the incoming US administration begins its tenure.

'Gaalibaaz' vs 'AAP-da': Poster war heats up in Delhi ahead of Assembly pollsWith the Delhi Assembly polls fast approaching, the poster war highlights the high-stakes battle between the BJP and AAP. Both parties are leaving no stone unturned in their efforts to win the trust of Delhi voters.

Los Angeles wildfire toll rises to 16 as flames spread, 'firenado' caught on cameraAt least 16 people have been killed and more than 12,000 structures destroyed as powerful winds have fanned wildfires into destructive infernos across Los Angeles, authorities said Sunday.

Greenland PM's reachout to Trump: Don't want to be Americans, but ready to talkTrump has called US control of Greenland an "absolute necessity," citing its strategic and economic importance. Now, Greenlandic leader Mute Egede has signalled openness to dialogue with the US.

Pickleball serves new business idea, merges passion with profitsThe pickleball rage in India has taken a new turn. The US-born game, which entered the sports scene in India just four years ago, has opened up a new investment option, promising big returns. Players are now putting in money as passion is meeting profits.

Spend less money on hair gel: Mel Gibson to California Governor amid wildfiresIn a post, actor Mel Gibson criticised California Governor Gavin Newsom over perceived failures in efforts to save homes during the devastating Los Angeles wildfires.

Encounter erupts between security forces, Naxals in Chhattisgarh's BijapurAn intermittent exchange of fire was going on after an encounter broke out between security personnel and Naxalites in Chhattisgarh's Bijapur district on Sunday morning. The gunfight came after 8 DRG personnel were killed after an IED blew up in Bijapur on January 6.

Game Changer: Telangana reverses ticket price hike for Ram Charan's filmThe Telangana government withdrew its orders to allow a ticket price hike for Ram Charan's latest film, Game Changer. The much-awaited movie released in theatres on January 10.

sports.headline: AC Milan set to hold discussion with Kyle Walker after player's transfer requestAC Milan have reportedly opened talks for Manchester City full-back Kyle Walker, who seeks a new challenge abroad after a decorated career in England. The 34-year-old's potential move signals a significant shift for both clubs in the transfer market.

Newly appointed skipper Mitchell Santner revealed the line-up via an official video.

Current coaching staff doesn't have confidence to correct Kohli: Bharat ArunFormer India bowling coach Bharat Arun feels that the current Indian coaching staff doesn't have the confidence and stature to correct Virat Kohli. Kohli was in terrible form in Australia and got out by edging the ball 8 times in his 9 innings.

Shakib was given a ban by the ECB after being suspected of an illegal action during a county game.

India decided to leave out Rishabh Pant from the squad as Dhruv Jurel was added as the backup wicketkeeper behind Sanju Samson.

Watch: Liam Haskett's father catches six hit against his son during BBL gameAdelaide Strikers' left-arm seamer Liam Haskett's father caught a six in the crowd hit against his son during Big Bash League Match 31.

Heather Knight urges ICC to help 'forgotten' Afghanistan team ahead of Ashes 2025Heather Knight has urged the ICC to support Afghanistan's exiled women cricketers, emphasising their struggles under the Taliban regime. She called for global attention as the Afghanistan Women's XI prepares for a symbolic T20 match in Melbourne.

Women's Hockey India League: Squads, streaming details, all you need to knowThe wait is finally over as the Women's Hockey India League is all set to start from Sunday, January 12 in Ranchi. 4 teams will be battling it out for the title in the first season of the competition which is expected to be a gamechanger for women's hockey.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
